title: Login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully login with valid registered credentials using Supabase Auth.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard.
Verify the loading screen disappears and dashboard content is displayed.

title: Login with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails when a user enters invalid credentials and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify error message about invalid credentials is displayed.
Verify user remains on the login page.

title: Logout functionality
description: Verify that a logged-in user can logout successfully and is redirected to the login page.

steps.description: Login successfully with valid credentials.
Click the logout button/link.
Verify user session is cleared.
Verify user is redirected to the login page.

title: Session persistence after page refresh
description: Verify that authenticated session persists after refreshing or revisiting the application.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Refresh the browser or close and reopen the browser tab within session expiry.
Verify user remains logged-in and dashboard is displayed without needing to login again.

title: Password recovery flow
description: Verify that users can request password recovery and receive instructions.

steps.description: Go to the login page.
Click on 'forgot password' link.
Input registered email address.
Submit password recovery request.
Verify confirmation message about recovery email is displayed.

title: Loading screen disappears after login
description: Verify the app does not get stuck on loading screen indefinitely after successful login resolving the infinite loading bug.

steps.description: Perform login with valid credentials.
Verify the loading spinner disappears within reasonable time.
Verify that dashboard content loads and is interactive.

title: Register new animal record with valid data
description: Verify a user can register a new animal with all required fields valid and GPS coordinates captured automatically.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the registration form.
Fill in all required fields correctly including name, species (dog/cat), and masked phone number.
Allow app to capture GPS coordinates automatically.
Submit the registration form.
Verify new record appears in the records table and on the map with correct location.

title: Register animal with invalid phone number format
description: Verify the form validation detects invalid Brazilian phone numbers and prevents submission.

steps.description: Navigate to the animal registration form.
Enter invalid phone number format in the phone input field.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify real-time validation message appears and form cannot be submitted.

title: Prevent duplicate animal registration
description: Verify that duplicate animal records (based on key attributes such as name and location) are detected and prevented in the form.

steps.description: Attempt to register a new animal with data identical to an existing animal record.
Verify duplicate detection warning is displayed.
Verify form submission is blocked until data is changed.

title: Editing animal record permissions
description: Verify edit functionality in the records table respects user permissions; Admin can edit any record, Funcionário only permitted records.

steps.description: Login as Admin and open records table.
Edit any animal record successfully.
Logout and login as Funcionário.
Attempt to edit records permitted and verify success.
Attempt to edit restricted records and verify editing is blocked or disabled.

title: Table filters, search, pagination
description: Verify that the animal records table supports advanced filtering by species, global search, and pagination properly functioning.

steps.description: Open records table.
Apply species filter (dog or cat).
Verify only filtered animal records are displayed.
Use global search to find specific records by name or other attributes.
Verify search results are correct.
Navigate through the pages using pagination controls.
Verify pages update and display correct records.

title: Map markers and filters
description: Verify that the interactive map displays all animal records with GPS markers and allows filtering by animal type.

steps.description: Navigate to the maps interface.
Verify all animal records are shown as markers at correct locations.
Filter markers by selecting animal type (dog or cat).
Verify only markers of selected type remain visible.
Click on a marker to open popup.
Verify popup displays correct animal details.

title: Export data functionality
description: Verify that animal records can be exported correctly in all supported formats: CSV, JSON, SPSS, GeoJSON, TXT.

steps.description: Navigate to export interface or dashboard export section.
Select each supported format one by one.
Initiate export and download the file.
Verify the downloaded file is not empty.
Verify file format matches the selected type and data structure is consistent with records.

title: Real-time data synchronization across users
description: Verify that when one user adds or edits animal records, the changes are updated in real-time on other users' dashboards and tables without page refresh.

steps.description: Login as User A and User B on two separate sessions/devices.
User A adds a new animal record.
Verify User B's dashboard and records table display the new record in real time.
User B updates an existing record.
Verify User A sees the updated record immediately.

title: Offline mode functionality with LocalStorage
description: Verify application operates fully offline including data entry and viewing, with data syncing automatically when connectivity is restored.

steps.description: Disconnect device from internet (simulate offline mode).
Open the application and verify it loads from LocalStorage.
Add new animal records and edit existing ones while offline.
Verify records are saved locally and UI shows offline status indicator.
Reconnect to the internet.
Verify local changes synchronize with cloud backend and UI shows online status.

title: Access control enforcement for admin vs employee
description: Verify that role-based permissions prevent unauthorized access and operations for 'Funcionário' and allow full access for 'Admin'.

steps.description: Login as 'Funcionário' user.
Attempt to access user management and audit logs.
Verify access is denied or those options are hidden.
Attempt restricted operations like deleting certain records.
Verify actions are blocked or show permission error.
Logout and login as 'Admin'.
Access user management, audit logs, and all record management features.
Verify full access and no restrictions.

title: Audit log accuracy and accessibility
description: Verify that all modifications are correctly recorded in audit logs and accessible only to authorized users.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Perform various data modifications (add, edit, delete) on animal records.
Navigate to audit log section.
Verify logs accurately display user actions with timestamps and record details.
Verify non-admin users cannot access audit logs.

title: Dashboard responsiveness and rendering
description: Verify dashboard UI components (charts, cards, graphs) render correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile with responsive layout.

steps.description: Access dashboard on desktop browser.
Verify all dashboard elements appear correctly and are interactive.
Access dashboard on tablet screen size emulation.
Verify layout adjusts properly without overlapping or clipping.
Access dashboard on mobile phone screen emulation.
Verify responsive behavior with optimized UI for small screens.

title: Sanitization and input validation for security
description: Verify that all inputs across the application are sanitized to prevent injection attacks and validated server-side.

steps.description: Attempt to input scripts or special characters into form fields like name, phone, descriptions.
Verify client-side validation blocks invalid inputs or escapes dangerous characters.
Submit malicious payloads and verify server-side rejects or sanitizes inputs correctly.
Verify no security errors occur and data stored is safe.

title: Loading timeout and error state handling
description: Verify that the app properly handles loading timeouts and shows error messages if backend or network is unreachable.

steps.description: Simulate backend downtime or network disconnection.
Attempt to login or load dashboard.
Verify loading screen does not persist indefinitely.
Verify appropriate error or timeout message is displayed to the user.
Retry connection and verify recovery to normal functioning.
